title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, outline, herringbone embriodery stitches
dimensions: H x W: 80 x 33 cm (31 1/2 in. x 13 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase in memory of Elizabeth Haynes
description: Broad rectangular border set with decorated cartouches with double-pointed ends, separated by group of crosses, interlaced knots, small cartouches with Islamic inscription; smaller border, top and bottom, with similar decoration; guilloche and interlacery guard-bands separating these and terminating panel at end. Solidly embroidered in forms of cross, outline, herringbone stitches in shades of red, orange, yellow, green. blue, brown-black, white, on undyed linen grounds. Traces of more sketchy fine geometric band with outer leaf border, in black with touches of white, at narrow ends of rectangle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile. Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross, outline, herringbone embriodery stitches. Museum purchase in memory of Elizabeth Haynes. 1954-75-1.
